name.baseName: Aluminum Recycling ; Recycled Aluminum Ingots ; Scrap Aluminum ; 2017
铝再生 ; 再生铝锭 ; 废铝 ; 2017年

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The recycled aluminum ingots produced from this industrial process are intended for use in various sectors where aluminum is required. These ingots can be used to manufacture automotive parts, construction materials, packaging, and consumer electronics. The high-purity recycled aluminum is suitable for applications that demand metal with less impurity, whereas the technical quality recycled aluminum might be utilized for less critical applications in large-scale manufacturing.
本工业流程生产的再生铝锭适用于多个需要使用铝材的领域。这些铝锭可以用于汽车部件、建筑材料、包装以及消费电子产品的制造。高纯度的再生铝适合对金属杂质要求较少的应用，而技术质量的再生铝可能用于大规模生产中对金属杂质要求不那么严格的应用。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The recycled aluminum ingots produced from this industrial process are intended for use in various sectors where aluminum is required. These ingots can be used to manufacture automotive parts, construction materials, packaging, and consumer electronics. The high-purity recycled aluminum is suitable for applications that demand metal with less impurity, whereas the technical quality recycled aluminum might be utilized for less critical applications in large-scale manufacturing.
本工业流程生产的再生铝锭适用于多个需要使用铝材的领域。这些铝锭可以用于汽车部件、建筑材料、包装以及消费电子产品的制造。高纯度的再生铝适合对金属杂质要求较少的应用，而技术质量的再生铝可能用于大规模生产中对金属杂质要求不那么严格的应用。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data in this study refers to the LCA data of PA, SA, electricity, and other background data. The PA data were obtained from statistical data sources, and the SA data were mainly obtained from the literatures. The background data were mainly derived from the Chinese localization LCA database CAS RCEES 2018, which was established by the Research Center for Eco-Environmental Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences and covers LCA data for energy, materials, transportation, waste management etc.
本研究的数据参考了PA、SA、电力等背景数据的LCA数据。PA数据来自统计数据源，SA数据主要来自文献。背景数据主要来自中国科学院生态环境研究中心CASRCEES 2018建立的中国本地化LCA数据库，涵盖能源、材料、交通、废物管理等LCA数据。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).
Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this LCA data for recycled aluminum ingots, it is crucial to consider the year of publication and the regional context of the data. The LCA data should be specifically applied to processes and products relevant to the Chinese market, as it is sourced from the CAS RCEES 2018 database. Users must take into account the technological applicability limits such as the type of scrap aluminum input and the efficiency of the recycling process. Moreover, users should be aware of the methodological assumptions, such as the inclusion or exclusion of ancillary material recycling and any credits from byproducts or waste management strategies inherent in the process.
在使用再生铝锭的LCA数据时，必须考虑刊物发表的年份和数据的地域背景。该LCA数据应专门应用于与中国市场相关的过程和产品，因为它来源于CAS RCEES 2018数据库。用户必须考虑技术适用性的限制，例如废铝输入的类型和回收过程的效率。此外，用户应该了解方法学假设，例如附属材料回收的包含或排除，以及过程中固有的副产品或废物管理策略可能带来的任何积分。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
